```{r}
library(nycflights13)
library(tidyverse)
```

Load data
```{r}
df_raw <- read_csv(here::here("dir_demo/data/raw/flights.csv"))
```

Get analysis dataset
```{r}
df <- flights %>%
  select(year, month, sched_dep_time, arr_delay,
  carrier, origin, dest, distance) %>%
  mutate(delayed = arr_delay > 0)
```

Get feel for vars
```{r}
count(df, carrier)
count(df, delayed)
hist(df$sched_dep_time)
hist(df$arr_delay)
```

```{r}
map(df, function(x) sum(is.na(x)) / length(x))
```

```{r}
df <- filter(df, !is.na(delayed))
```

```{r}
write_csv(df, here::here("dir_demo/data/clean_flights.csv"))
```
